collection.name: Crypto Citizens
collection.description:
CryptoCitizens are an ongoing generative portrait collection of 10,000 NFTs, powered by Art Blocks, minting in cities around the world. Each one is an equal member of the Bright Moments DAO. The collection will be complete at the end of 2023 when the 10,000th CryptoCitizen is minted in City #10. 

**[WEBSITE](https://www.brightmoments.io)** | **[DISCORD](https://discord.gg/brightmoments)**
